PHYSICIAN FEES
The Sub-Natural Classification.31-Physician, under Natural Classification, 30-Professional Fees, must be reported by the
functional cost center to which the physician is assigned. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
